boardgame.name: There Be Dragons
boardgame.description:
From the description:

Ulthurus, an adult white dragon, has recently made its lair in the remains of Icefang Fortress in the Bladespine Mountains. From its new roost, it's been accosting traveling caravans and nearby villages leaving icy destruction in its wake. To make matters worse, a tribe of kobold zealots have come to worship Ulthurus and have begun raiding settlements and attacking passersby in the hopes of acquiring more wealth for their new master. Recently, a prized relic was stolen from the house of the mayor of Hornsmeet by a small group of the kobolds and the mayor desperately wants it back... along with the head of the dragon before it freezes his village solid. In exchange, he's offered 5,000 gp along with whatever the dragon has in its hoard, aside from the relic.

boardgame.name: The Unquiet Dead
boardgame.description:
From the Introduction:

The Unquiet Dead is intended for four characters with an average party level (APL) of 1. Characters who complete this
adventure should earn enough experience to reach 3rd-level.

The dead have begun to rise from a family's crypt and figures were seen skulking about in the dark. This campaign takes place in Arden, although it can be set in your own world. Any party composition should be able to finish the adventure with intelligent play.

boardgame.name: Frozen Temple of the Ice Priest
boardgame.description:
From the Introduction:

Frozen Temple of the Ice Priest is intended for four characters with an average party level (APL) of 3. Characters who complete this adventure should earn enough experience to reach halfway to 4th-level.

A terrible blizzard has appeared out of nowhere and our heroes are forced to seek shelter in a nearby ruin. This campaign takes place in Arden, although it can be set in your own world. Any party composition should be able to finish the adventure with intelligent play.

boardgame.name: Forsaken Labyrinth of the Golden Baron
boardgame.description:
From the Introduction:

Forsaken Labyrinth of the Golden Baron is intended for four characters with an average party level (APL) of 3. Characters who complete this adventure should earn enough experience to reach 4th-level.

A
map to a lost tyrant's tomb and treasures finally surfaces. This campaign takes place in Arden, although it can be set in your own world. Any party composition should be able to finish the adventure with intelligent play.

boardgame.name: Palace of the Fire Oracle
boardgame.description:
From the Introduction:

Palace of the Fire Oracle is intended for four characters with an average party level (APL) of 3. Characters who complete this adventure should earn enough experience to reach 4th-level.

A local temple has been overrun with elementals and someone must retrieve the holy relic within. This campaign takes place in Arden, although it can be set in your own world. Any party composition should be able to finish the adventure with intelligent play.

boardgame.name: Abbey of the Black Prince
boardgame.description:
From the Introduction:

Abbey of the Black Prince is intended for four characters with an average party level (APL) of 5. Characters who complete this adventure should earn enough experience to reach halfway to 6th-level.

The ruins of an ancient abbey have been uncovered and all who venture inside fail to return. This campaign takes place in Arden, although it can be set in your own world. Any party composition should be able to finish the adventure with intelligent play.

boardgame.name: Dodge Dess
boardgame.description:
Dodge Dess is a simple strategy print and play board game inspired by a combination between dodgeball and chess, then dice are added to add random elements to it. that's why this game is called “Dodge Dess” (dodgeball, dice, and chess). in short, the theme of this game is sports.

The game is played in a way where players can move their pawns vertically, horizontally, and diagonally with the distance of the squares determined by the number of dice that have been rolled. almost the same as moving, attacking (removing the opponent's pawn from the game), can be done vertically and diagonally with a predetermined distance from the rolled dice. because the player's pawn cannot cross the center line, then after attacking the opponent's pawn the player's pawn must immediately return to the previous box.

The goal of the game is to get rid of all opponent pawns from the game.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: A Little More Grape Captain Bragg! Wargame Rules for the Mexican-American War 1846-1848
boardgame.description: Miniatures wargame rules for the Mexican-American War.

boardgame.name: TAIJI Supreme Ultimate Playing Cards
boardgame.description:
TAIJI Supreme Ultimate Playing Cards is a Non-Standard Universal Deck based on the principles of yin and yang. This deck can be used to play over 15 games.

TAIJI Supreme Ultimate Playing Cards are an improved version of the standard deck. The power behind this deck is in its versatility to be interpreted in multiple ways creating different core game mechanics.

There are four main game styles:
1)TAIJI - Uses + & - Card Values. Winning hands are closest to zero. (Use absolute value to determine winner)
2)WUJI - Uses + & - Card Values. Winning hands are farthest from zero. (Use direct correlation to determine winner)
3)CLASSIC - All Card Values are positive. Interpret cards like a standard deck with predetermined Card Hierarchy.
4)INTERPRETIVE - Rules unique for individual games.

The numerous game styles allow for a wide variety of card games to be played, with the manufacturer currently publishing rules for 15 unique games on their website.

boardgame.name: Forward Operations
boardgame.description:
In Forward Operations, two to four players control border nations rushing to build and man forward operating bases so they can take and hold critical objectives in a neighboring country that is becoming unstable. Win the game by holding those objectives for victory points or by destroying the Command Center of your opponents' bases.

Players start with an established forward operating base, which consists of a Command Center, Barracks and a Power Plant. During the game, you'll play Command Cards to generate resources, which can be used to expand your base, develop new technologies, train or manufacture military units, and wage war on your opponents in bloody, fast-paced combat.

Forward Operations is a turn-based wargame sandbox filled with interesting player decisions and building options. Choose between 14 different buildings to expand your base and 25 different military units to build a personalized army that suits your strategy and playing style. Time and resources are limited, so choose wisely.

See you on the battlefield.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Disgraced Night Silveria
The Raped Knight of Silveria
Ryoujoku no Kishi Silveria
凌辱の騎士シルヴェリア
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Adult RPG set in a fantasy world with the usual suspects: humans, elves, demons, etc..
One of the elves is Sylveria a novice adventurer skilled in swordplay and wants to make some money by taking on some jobs...

boardgame.name: Bitch JK Legend - My Dick is Just Too Big
Chronicle of Bitch Girl - My Dick is too Large
ビッチJK伝 俺のマラはでかすぎる
碧池JK传 我的鸡鸡超级大
걸레 여고생전 내 자지는 너무 커
boardgame.description:
User Summary

As a teacher substitute at a high school, Takayoshi Ohki is teaching a class of girls who are extremely bored with school, spending time putting on makeup or taking a nap - and is extremely lewd!

boardgame.name: A Secret Between You and Me
You and Me and Secret
きみとぼくとかくしごと
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Sequel to CHARON's free games You, Me, and Empty Words.

Visual novel in the horror-adventure genre set in a world of lust

boardgame.name: Homo
boardgame.description:
Players each control 12 round, triangle, and square pieces that can move diagonally and orthogonally, diagonally, and orthogonally respectively. Capturing is done by sandwiching an opponent's piece between two of the same pieces. The winner is the player who captures all of his opponent's pieces. A player loses if he cannot move or no longer have two pieces of the same shape.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Zig Zag
boardgame.description: Players take turns placing black or white pieces on a 8x14 grid to connect both sides of the board. Only bicolored pieces can be placed on the black squares, and these can be turned over into the opponent's color when surrounded by the opponent's pieces.

boardgame.name: High Heavens: Minotaur
boardgame.description: The Minotaur is a limited edition playable character for High Heavens. With his unique special ability, the Minotaur can clear the way for other gods by damaging multiple adjacent enemies in one attack.

boardgame.name: Palabrerío
boardgame.description:
A creative game to find the best words.
Like tutti frutti game, but with five different ways to play it!

Five forms of play: "everyone plays", "challenge", "just drawings", "go ahead" and "say it with mimicry". Each with a different score. We just have to find the best words. Highly competitive!

boardgame.name: Poesía a la Carta: María Teresa Andruetto
boardgame.description:
A poetic game to connect with the poetry of María Teresa Andruetto.

Three forms of play: "poetry on demand", "poetic tarot" and "recycling of words". Think of a question and poetry will answer you. Includes 5 Tarot figures and 5 quotes chosen by the author.

boardgame.name: Poesía a la Carta: Gustavo Roldán
boardgame.description:
A game to connect with the poetry of Gustavo Roldán.
As a poetic oracle, each poem, combined with the lunfardo, can offer us an answer.

Three forms of play: "poetry on demand", "poetic oracle" and "playing the game". Think of a question and poetry will answer you. Includes 10 letters with words from the lunfardo to complete the answer.

boardgame.name: Mass Effect: Corsair
boardgame.description: A first-person Mass Effect spin-off was once in development for the Nintendo DS.

boardgame.name: Poesía a la Carta: Laura Devetach
boardgame.description:
A poetic game to connect with the poetry of Laura Devetach.

Three forms of play: "poetry on demand", "poetic oracle" and "cauldron of questions". Think of a question and poetry will answer you. Include 10 hexagrams from the I-Ching to complete the answer.

boardgame.name: Agent (0000 / BioWare)
boardgame.description: The idea being that James Bond isn’t just a gun that walks around the world and shoots people. He’s a suave manipulator, he’s a talented martial artist, he’s a secret agent. We wanted to cross that 007 with Jason Bourne, where he’s been modified in some way; you’re not sure what, but he’s definitely deadly.

boardgame.name: Contame: Inicios
boardgame.description:
You can choose beginnings, settings, objects and characters to create the best stories.
Ideal for collaborative play.

Players must separate the deck into 3 groups: "beginnings", "scenarios" and "illustrations". Whoever starts chooses a card from the “beginnings” deck and one from the “scenarios” deck to begin and set the story. Then it will take 5 "illustrations". With all these cards you must create and tell a new story.

boardgame.name: Shadow Realms
boardgame.description: Set in both modern day Earth and the parallel world of Embra, Heroes possessing magical powers wake up and are pulled into a dark realm and centuries old battle. They take part in adventures, facing off against an array of creatures in a war against the Shadow Legions, to save all of humanity.

boardgame.name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry – Sentinels of Order
boardgame.description:
Chaos corrupts all, but it does not go unopposed. The forces of Order fight to reclaim what’s been taken, including the Allpoints, as the lands of the Varanspire were once known. Small forces are even now testing the defences of their infernal foes, infiltrating those blasted lands through stealth and guile. Every champion of the Ruinous Powers slain is a victory to be celebrated, every ancient relic liberated a gift for civilisation. Now it’s up to you – resist and reclaim!

Sentinels of Order is the essential guide to commanding the forces of Grand Alliance: Order in games of Warcry. 12 warbands are detailed in full, from the noble Chambers of the Stormcast Eternals to mysterious aelves and sturdy duardin. You’ll find loads of new fighter cards, background tables, Fated Quests, and Challenge Battles – in short, everything you need to play the forces of Order in full campaigns.

Inside, you’ll find:


Full rules for the following warbands: Cities of Sigmar, Daughters of Khaine, Idonenth Deepkin, Khainite Shadowstalkers, Kharadron Overlords, Lumineth Realm-lords, Fyreslayers, Seraphon, Sylvaneth, Stormcast Eternals Sacrosanct Chamber, Stormcast Eternals Warrior Chamber, and Stormcast Eternals Vanguard Auxiliary Chamber.
Fighter cards for nearly every model available to the Grand Alliance: Order ranges.
Rules for two Monsters of Order: War Hydra and Kharibdyss.
Refined rules to include Monsters in your warband, as well as new abilities to use against them!
New rules for warbands with mixed Faction Runemarks under the same Grand Alliance and more than one Leader.
Tables for warrior names, warband origins, and leader backgrounds.
4 Order Fated Quests, including Spoils of Victory tables for both Honour and Glory.
6 Order Challenge Battles, including special rules and valuable Spoils.
Blank roster sheets to copy and fill.


If you yearn to take the fight to the eternal enemy of Order, this 112-page softback book is for you.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry Starter Set

boardgame.name: Doblete
boardgame.description:
A memory game to enjoy classic tales along with the best known literary characters.

4 ways to play. You can search for the same characters or try to find the literary pairs. Make a fantastic pair or play it in “Chancho va!” mode.

boardgame.name: Myriorama: La Biblioteca Infinita
boardgame.description:
An ideal game to create and tell endless stories!

Seven game suggestions. The myrioramas can be created individually, in groups or collaboratively, and the stories can be told orally or in writing.

boardgame.name: I Am Not The Thief!
boardgame.description:
On a stormy night, the mysterious package arrives. The lights go out. When the power is restored, the lights flicker on to reveal that the box has been ripped open and its contents stolen. All of us have something with us in our backpacks, handbags, satchels, etc., but one of us is The Thief.

The Thief must make up a story about why they have the stolen item to fool the innocent. The innocent use a prompt to explain why they have their item and try to catch The Thief!

Each player has a card sleeve with a picture of there item that shows a picture of the item and a prompt for a story about why they have it. The Thief has a sleeve that blocks the prompt.

boardgame.name: Fantasy Tavern Sextet -Vol.1 New World Days-
異世界酒場のセクステット ～Vol.1 New World Days～
boardgame.description:
User Summary

A cook at an Akihabara maid café suddenly gets pulled into a fantasy world, with no way to return.
He stumple upon Lupine who is the female owner of the inn The Stray Sheep who saves his life.

boardgame.name: Biddabbell
boardgame.description:
Abstract set collection/simultaneous auction game.

Each turn, a card from hand is played to bid on order of choice. In choice order, take one of the cards in the market. At the end of each turn, cards used to bid will be added to the market.

At the end, cards remaining in hand determin how your sets score.

This game was entered into the 2020 ELL deck design competition and was deemed joint-winner (along with Invizibell).

boardgame.name: Fantasy Tavern Sextet -Vol.2 Adventurer's Days-
異世界酒場のセクステット ～Vol.2 Adventurer's Days～
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Part two of the story where our Akihabara cook begin to spend time with the female knight Dahlia who have taken up the job as waitress Lupine's tavern.

boardgame.name: Revolver
boardgame.description:
Revolver, a spiritual successor to Jade Empire, was never officially announced. Bits and pieces about it surfaced over the years, before BioWare finally went into detail on the game in its recent 25th anniversary book.

Set in the near-future, the project was designed to spread BioWare's trademark narrative and character-driven efforts across a more open-world and action-heavy setting. Huh, sounds familiar.

boardgame.name: Fantasy Tavern Sextet -Vol.3 Postlude Days-
異世界酒場のセクステット 〜Vol.3 Postlude Days〜
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Final chapter in the Fantasy Tavern Sextet story: this time our guy gets quite a surprise as Anzu - the top maid at the maid café he worked at barge into the inn here in the fantasy world and starts her own tavern!

boardgame.name: Heißes Brezel-Rennen
boardgame.description:
7 baked goods that have not yet been baked (rolls, baguettes, etc.) are on their way to the ovens. At the beginning, each player makes a prediction as to which goods will end up in which oven. In turn, any 3 of the color dice are rolled (each die represents a baked good) and the corresponding goods are moved towards the ovens, provided they are not blocked by other goods. As soon as a good reaches the oven area, it is pushed into the first free oven. As soon as all ovens are filled with goods, the checkout takes place. For each correct prediction, points are awarded according to the oven (between 1 for the first and 4 for the last one). The player with the most points wins.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Flohmarkt
Marché
boardgame.description:
In a round trip, the dice are rolled sometimes clockwise, sometimes counterclockwise. You can move with all the game pieces. If you arrive at a stand where the flea market item cards with the values 1-15 are displayed, you roll all three color dice to determine the price of the item. The price is written down on a piece of paper. The first player to sell items for Fr. 80 or more is the winner.

—user summary

boardgame.description:
Probably published in early 1987.


Neues über Druiden
Darkon vom Amboß
Neue Zauber
Dokument der Stärke
Meisterinformationen: Eine Falle (Möchtegerneinbrechers Selbstgefangennahme)
Der Gnom

boardgame.name: Spionage
boardgame.description:
Each player has 15 agents, 4 bases and 1 robot. The game is played on a playing field with a network of paths over which you move your pieces and on which you can set up bases. The player whose turn it is rolls 2 dice and can convert the points rolled into: Movement of the individual agents (1 dice point each), deployment of the robot (9 dice points), establishment of a base (6 dice points), air strike (10 dice points), air landing (12 dice points). In addition, it is possible to waive the dice roll and save additional dice points for an action in the next round. For this, however, the action of the next round must be announced and also executed. The player who first manages to occupy 3 squares in the opponent's headquarters by eliminating foreign agents wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Das Magische Blatt (Issue 2 - Apr 1987)
boardgame.description:
Von Meister zu Meister (Umgang mit mächtigen Zaubern)
Falle: Der chemische Dosenöffner
Darkon vom Amboß
Fasar
Über die Magie
Neue Talente
Neues vom Gnom
Neue Wunder

boardgame.description:
Gifte mischen, Tränke brauen
Darkon vom Amboß
Anhang: Die Schiffsschleuder
Diebe unter uns
Immansaison beginnt (aventurischer Mannschaftssport)

boardgame.name: StoryWorld: NSFW Expansion Pack
boardgame.description:
A perfect choice for a party game, where the stories can become a little more intense. This will add even more fun to the game, just dont be afraid to tell your must hidden secrets!

44 new cards!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: StoryWorld: Horror Expansion Pack
boardgame.description: Tell the most terrifying stories and create moments of true horror with your friends. Solve the mystery of a haunted house or face a wave of zombies, everything depends on you and your imagination! 44 new cards!

boardgame.name: StoryWorld: Fantasy Expansion Pack
boardgame.description: Enter a world full of magical and powerful creatures, where everything is different from reality. Be ready to travel through magical portals and discover new worlds! 44 new cards!

boardgame.name: The Game of the Hen
boardgame.description: Learn the seasonality by playing and answering questions on sustainable lifestyle and the cycle of the seasons, but also miming and drawing. Developed exclusively by Lo Scarabeo to Eataly - the widest space in the world devoted to excellence Italian food and wine - a game for the whole family to enjoy together.

boardgame.name: United States Visiting Forces Supplement for Threat Level: Emergency Response
boardgame.description:
This product is an extra to the main rulebook.
The main rulebook is required to understand this product.

This book contains keywords and stat cards to make the game easier to understand.

Threat Level:Emergency Response is a battle system focused on British Police, Paramedics and Fire Brigades.
With This supplement, it adds United States Air Force in Europe into the game.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Spielwelt Special
boardgame.description:
This special edition of Spielwelt was issued on the occasion of the release of the german version of (Classic) TRAVELLER. The issues contains previously published articles on the GDW games Imperium, Snapshot and Azhanti High Lightning.

As a bonus this issues also includes three adventures for (Classic) TRAVELLER:

- Yellow Oyster Alpha (Ingo Martin)
- Lamech (Ludger Fischer)
- Safari auf Lyonessé (Ludger Fischer, Stefan Wallmann)
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Club für Fantasy- und Simulationsspiele e.V.

boardgame.name: L'Italia s'è desta!
boardgame.description:
L'Italia s'è desta!, Italy has woken up!:
these Wargame rules are created to simulate the Italian wars of independence, without being too complicated.

To play you need a playing field.
The terrain scale varies per scenario, the reference is 1:5.500.

Turn Sequence:

Impulse of Player A:
Bombardment phase
Shooting phase
Maneuvering phase and charges
Melee Combat Phase

Impulse of Player B:
Repeat the above

boardgame.name: Łódź 1914
boardgame.description:
The game covers a clash between German, Austro-Hungarian and Russian armies. It is divided in three scenarios, covering different stages of the battle. Each stage has different objectives, marked by victory points. Supply plays a key role, when planning offensives on enemy soil.

A fourth scenario combines map and units from this game with the map and units from Tannenberg 1914 and covers the Second Battle of Masurian Lakes.

Rules:
The game is using the WB-95 system, which contains additions related to the time period. This rule-set is the base for WB-48.

boardgame.name: Su Le Teste ! Le guerre napoleoniche: Nuova Edizione
Su le Teste!: Wargame tattico napoleonico
boardgame.description:
Su le Teste! ("Up the heads") is a historical miniature wargame for Napoleonic battles and campaigns from 1805 to 1815.

The rules brings all the charm of Napoleonic military exploits on the tabletop,.

A playful work dedicated to the men of those times and aimed at players with a taste for simulation with miniature historical wargames.
A laborious work animated by a passion for history and forged by decades of experience.

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: Freelance Traveller (Issue 106 - Jul/Aug 2021)
boardgame.description:
From the contents page

Freelance Traveller #106: July/August 2021

Freelance Traveller is published bimonthly in PDF form by the editor. The current issue (and all back issues) can be found on Freelance Traveller’s website, http://www.freelancetraveller.com.

boardgame.name: The Island of Doctor Destroyer
boardgame.description:
From the Back Cover

UNTIL describes him as the deadliest man alive. Superheroes pause in respectful concern when his name is mentioned.

The world's most brilliant physicist and inventor fro the past kept alive through dread technology now threatens the entire world once more. Are your superheroes up to the task of invading...

The Island of Doctor Destroyer

The first Champions adventure ever published is now available again, updated to sixth edition! With new updated content matching modern time and game play, The Island of Doctor Destroyer is back for you and your gaming group.

Experience the excitement and thrills of the world's first Champions module, a product that launched an entirely new gaming genre, today!

Now with a new introductory scenario, updated enemies and new artwork! Includes tips and variants for making the adventure more exciting and fresh, even for those who have played it before.

boardgame.name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar General's Handbook Pitched Battles 2021
boardgame.description:
The essential 2021 General’s Handbook is an invaluable supplement that enhances your games of Warhammer Age of Sigmar. This year’s edition is divided into two separate books – the General’s Handbook comes as a 96-page ring-bound hardback, while the Pitched Battle Profiles book is a 34-page softback.

Inside this year’s General’s Handbook, you'll find…


High-level background information on Ghur, the Realm of Beasts, which is the setting for this General's Handbook and Pitched Battle Season.
A focused description of the war of Thondia, the area in Ghur which is in the midst of desperate conflict. Thondia is key to the current narrative of Warhammer Age of Sigmar, and is part of the setting for this General's Handbook and Pitched Battle Season.
Rules for a new Region of War – The Ghurrish Heartlands – which include two special rules (Predators and Prey and Seismic Shift), one additional Realmsphere Magic spell available to all Wizards (Metamorphosis), and one additional Realm Command which all players have access to (Feral Roar).
Two additional core battalions that players can include in their army in addition to the Core Battalions included in the core rules: Alpha-Beast Pack and Hunters of the Heartlands.
Rules for eight grand strategies that dictate what an army will try and achieve during the battle. They offer additional victory points if completed by the end of the game: Sever the Head, Hold the Line, Vendetta, Dominating Presence, Beast Master, Prized Sorcery, Pillars of Belief, and Predator's Domain.
Rules for eight battle tactics that can be used to determine who won the game. They reflect commands given by the leaders of the army over the course of the battle, and represent the army trying to achieve certain goals on the field of battle each turn: Broken Ranks, Conquer, Slay the Warlord, Ferocious Advance, Savage Spearhead, Aggressive Expansion, Monstrous Takeover, and Bring It Down!
A photocopiable scoring sheet, designed to keep track of the various objectives throughout the battle.
Guidance on the minimum accepted standard for using miniatures in Pitched Battle games of Warhammer Age of Sigmar.
12 battleplans for the Pitched Battle 2021 season: Marking Territory, Savage Gains, First Blood, Power Struggle, Survival of the Fittest, Tectonic Interference, Apex Predators, The Vice, Tooth and Nail, Feral Foray, Power in Numbers, and The Veins of Ghur.
A list of all the official publications which can be used when building an army for use in Pitched Battles.
Updated warscrolls for the following 17 endless spells: Horrorghast, Aethervoid Pendulum, Chronomantic Cogs, Emerald Lifeswarm, Geminids of Uhl-Gysh, Malevolent Maelstrom, Prismatic Palisade, Purple Sun of Shyish, Quicksilver Swords, Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws, Soulsnare Shackles, Suffocating Gravetide, The Burning Head, Umbral Spellportal, Soulscream Bridge, Shards of Valagharr, and Lauchon the Soulseeker.
The Warhammer Age of Sigmar core rules


Please note: The ring-bound design of the General’s Handbook and layout of the battleplans have been designed so that the book can be folded flat to save space, while still providing an overview of the essential information to easily reference once the game has begun.

Inside this year’s Pitched Battle Profiles book, you'll find…


An introduction to Pitched Battle Profiles and descriptions of the four different types of battlefield role: Artillery, Battleline, Behemoth, and Leader.
Details on how to use allies in Pitched Battles in the 2021 Season
Updated Pitched Battle Profiles for every unit, faction, and Grand Alliance in Warhammer Age of Sigmar, as follows:


Order: Cities of Sigmar, Daughters of Khaine, Fyreslayers, Idoneth Deepkin, Kharadron Overlords, Lumineth Realm-lords, Seraphon, Stormcast Eternals, and Sylvaneth.

Chaos: Beasts of Chaos, Blades of Khorne, Disciples of Tzeentch, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Maggotkin of Nurgle, Skaven, and Slaves to Darkness.

Death: Flesh-eater Courts, Nighthaunt, Ossiarch Bonereapers, and Soulblight Gravelords.

Destruction: Gloomspite Gitz, Ogor Mawtribes, Orruk Warclans, and Sons of Behemat.


Updated Pitched Battle profiles for the 17 endless spells from Malign Sorcery and Forbidden Power.


PLUS:
The General’s Handbook 2021 also comes with a card token board, which contains 14 double-sided tokens as follows:


10x Objective / Prime Objectives
1x Battle Tactic Token – Broken Ranks / Bring It Down!
1x Battle Tactic Token – Aggressive Expansion / Conquer
1x Battle Tactic Token – Slay the Warlord / Monstrous Takeover
1x Battle Tactic Token – Ferocious Advance / Savage Spearhead


—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Anticamente: Wargame ad aree esagonali per il periodo antico
boardgame.description:
Anticamente ("In Ancient Times") allows you to play epic battles from antiquity to the early renaissance, using an aerial approach.
The aerial approach will allow you to use the three-dimensional elements of the landscape in complete synergy with the rules.

–description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: Hordes & Heroes: Medieval
boardgame.description:
Hordes & Heroes Medieval is designed as a fast play tabletop historical wargame, which uses hexagon marked terrain as a precise and effective method for moving troops. The rule system is simple and easy to learn, yet sophisticated enough to allow “realistic“ battles to be fought between a diverse range of medieval armies. It is easy to play, but more difficult to master.

One A4 Quick Reference Sheet is sufficient to contain all the information necessary to play. The Combat Results Tables can be printed or photocopied, cut and pasted together as required. The main rules need only be consulted when players are learning the rules, and occasionally thereafter, to clarify situations as they arise.

The precision of the movement system and the speed and efficiency of the combat system ensure that the game flows quickly and even a closely fought contest between two armies of 150 points can be concluded within 1½ hours to 2 hours.

The game is designed to be played on modular hex terrain which can accommodate a range of different terrain features, e.g. open ground, hills and slopes, rivers, woods, impenetrable terrain etc. Larger terrain features can extend over a number of adjacent hexes. The terrain is an extremely important aspect of the rules, in that, it is of great strategical and tactical significance because of the way it influences movement, Command and Control, and combat.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Hordes & Heroes: Medieval – Siege & Assault Supplement

boardgame.name: Train in Vain
boardgame.description:
A roll and write game of rails across various terrain where players try to connect Cities, buy and sell goods, and complete contracts. Players are responsible for upgrading their trains to be able to develop better abilities and make their travel easier and more profitable. The Conductor and Engineer lend a hand as well as the occasional Station that can be dropped on an empty hex of the map to complete those languishing routes.

Each turn a pair of dice are rolled. All players use the same dice to complete an action: place a track, hire Conductor and Engineer, work toward a train upgrade, buy or sell a Good.

Clever placement is the order of the day in this game, players will find themselves feeling like their trains are in vain on non-connected tracks until it all comes together and Contracts start flying off the board.

Train in Vain plays 1+ players, meaning any number of players could play as long as they have access to the dice.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Hordes & Heroes: Medieval – Siege & Assault Supplement
boardgame.description:
Hordes & Heroes Medieval Siege & Assault Rules - Wargaming sieges and assaults have always proved challenging to wargamers.

Sieges were by their very nature often long drawn out affairs often lasting many weeks, months or even years.
Once the preparations for the assault were complete and the attack was launched the fighting would be fast, furious and intense as attackers and defenders fought for supremacy.
The Siege & Assault rules enable the Hordes & Heroes system to be used to conduct sieges and assaults against defended castles, towns and strongholds. They enable the use of a wide range of medieval siege equipment to be employed in breaching an array of different defences from simple earthworks to the massive stone walls of a major city.
In conjunction with the core medieval rules they enable campaign scenarios to be constructed which enable gamers to explore the strategic as well as the tactical aspects of medieval warfare.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Scrappet Kaiser Princess
boardgame.description:
Mindy has just turned 10 and her parents have finally allowed her to play the collectable card game she’s been obsessing over: Scrappet Kaiser. But with the annual tournament starting next week, her journey to become the best has hit warp speed! With her close circle of friends and a few bucks, can she build a collection good enough to compete with the champ?

In this solitaire worker-placement board game, you play as Mindy as she plans out how her friends run various errands throughout the week. However, plans will fall apart as unexpected Events ruin your day and reveal that your friends just aren’t that into Scrappet Kaiser! As your collection grows, don’t forget to keep that Ego in check, because your friends will also get tired of getting bossed around. After seven days, total up your final score and check your ranking in the rulebook. Help Mindy become the champ by getting an S Rank!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Hordes & Heroes: Medieval – Army Lists
Hordes & Heroes: Medieval – Listes d'Armée
boardgame.description:
The HHM army lists are designed to enable any medieval historical army to be represented on the table top, in a miniature game, up to an agreed point value.

We have endeavoured to make the lists as flexible as the historical sources which were consulted would permit.

Hordes & Heroes Medieval Army Lists currently contain 28 different armies which can be easily modified and adapted to your own specific preferences or requirements, for use in a particular game, or to form part of an historical campaign.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: History: Kamakura Period to Muromachi Period

boardgame.name: ARK - Genesis 2
ARK - Genesis: Part 2
ARK: Survival Evolved – Genesis – Part 2
boardgame.description:
Genesis: Part 2 has survivors exploring a vast world filled with strange new Biomes, Story Missions, and exotic Creatures. The map is set aboard the massive Genesis-Ship traveling through deep space. Unique Features:


Hyperspace, an event that appears during the night, this makes the sky go purple with millions of stars passing by and the ship will eventually arrive at another planet. This event causes the asteroids in the -Space- area to change afterwards.
Rockwell's Proliferation, an area fused with the insides of Sir Edmund Rockwell, affectionately known as the Rockwell's Innards biome.
An area in between the two rings known as -Space-, while low in biodiversity it does have asteroids that transform after a hyperspace event has occured.
Past creatures only encounter-able during missions.
New Creature Variant: R




Story

Uma crafted the ARK network and a Santiago clone desighned the machine animals as means of scrubbing "Element" from the soil. Meanwhile, a hostile transhuman force engineers exotic and dangerous new lifeforms.

boardgame.name: ARK - Crystal Isles
ARK: Survival Evolved – Crystal Isles
ISO: Crystal Isles
boardgame.description:
Crystal Isles is an official, non-canonical (free DLC) expansion map. Whether you think you know Crystal Isles or plan to explore this map for the first time, you should be prepared for new discoveries. Build your bases high in rainforest canopy and mysterious floating islands, then dive deep into undersea caverns in search of resources. Tame and saddle up your own Tropeognathus—ARK’s newest pterosaur—for a dizzying jet-fuel-powered ride into aerial combat, complete with powerful mounted flak cannon!

It was originally developed by Isolde Gaming, Lillian, and iSPEZZ.

Unique Features:


An island constantly engulfed in darkness and thunder known as Eldritch Isle with floating water bubbles and an abundance of rare resources.
A massive cluster of floating islands known as Apotheosis.
An enormous bee hive in the form of a cave filled with honey and home to Giant Worker Bees and Dire Bears.
Bogs filled with rotting corpses that inflict a Torpor-inducing debuff.


Note: Some engrams unique to the paid DLC maps, such as adobe structures, will be unavailable if the DLC has not been purchased. These items still have a chance of appearing in supply drops.

boardgame.name: ARK - Lost Island‎
ARK: Survival Evolved – Lost Island
boardgame.description:
Lost Island is a free, official, non-canonical DLC expansion map

Explore new heights and hidden depths in this expansive 150 sq. kilometer map where Survivors will encounter new biomes, challenges, and mysterious ruins! Whether it's exploring the valley of waterfalls, setting up your treehouse home in the Redwood Forests, getting down and dirty in the vast swamps, diving deep underwater, climbing snowy mountains, or caving, there's something for every Survivor out there! Arriving with the map will be 3 brand new real-world creatures, including the Amargasaurus and one chosen explicitly by the ARK community!

Note: Some engrams unique to the paid DLC maps, such as adobe structures, will be unavailable if the DLC has not been purchased. These items still have a chance of appearing in supply drops.

boardgame.name: ARK - Valguero
ARK: Survival Evolved – Valguero
boardgame.description:
Valguero is an official, non-canonical (free DLC) expansion map that features one new Creature, two variations of the Rock Elemental, and an 63 km2 map, including an underground ocean called The Abyss. Explore new heights and hidden depths; Whether it's creating your foundations in the White cliffs or discovering the secrets of the pit of Aberration, Valguero offers a new experience of the ARK universe. With new biomes, formidable dungeon bosses and mysterious ruins to discover, there is always something exciting - and dangerous - in Valguero. Among its more than 60 kilometers, you'll find everything from lush jungles to environmental hazards, from snowfields to lava flows, to savannas and hot springs.Unique Features:


Tek dinos and some creatures from Aberation
Rainbows across the map.
Occasional auroras at night.
Shooting stars at night.
Freezing air in the Snow Desert.
There is also an underground biome called the aberration trench.
Mushrooms on the emerald forest that can be harvested for Flowers, Rare Mushrooms and Bio Toxin.
Radiation area called the Unknown.
An Underground Volcanic WyvernTrench, to get Fire Wyvern Eggs.
















Note: Some engrams unique to the paid DLC maps, such as adobe structures, will be unavailable if the DLC has not been purchased. These items still have a chance of appearing in supply drops.

The Rock Drake (from Aberation) and Extinction creatures were originally included, but later removed to encourage paid DLC sales.

boardgame.name: Arkedo Series 002: SWAP!
boardgame.description:
A block-matching puzzle game. Swap tiles around on the field to make lines of four or more before they reach the top of the screen to help King Kat get his castle back.

User Summary

boardgame.name: Mud Cakes
boardgame.description:
Mud Cakes is a tribute to childhood memories when our grandma took care of us in her home, and we played in the garden creating stories, imagining adventures, and even cooking mud cakes.

Some dirt and water are enough to get in a culinary mud challenge and create the most exquisite preparations to fulfill your client’s wishes. Clay, bugs, dry leaves, stones, grass, even snails may help you to delight you special guests: you granny, little brother, teddy bear, your dog, cat and Nina doll.

Get as many satisfaction points from the guests by having fun in the mud and cooking the most suited mud cakes.

What’s the order?

----español

Mud Cakes, es un bello homenaje a los recuerdos de la infancia, cuando la abuela nos cuidaba en su casa y nos divertíamos en su jardín creando historias, imaginando aventuras e incluso cocinando pasteles de lodo.

Un poco de tierra y agua es suficiente para eludirnos en un desafío culinario y preparar los postres más exquisitos para satisfacer las preferencias del público. Arcilla, bichos, hojas secas, rocas, pasto y hasta caracoles en el menú para deleitar a nuestros invitados especiales: Abuelita, hermanito, osito de peluche, cachorro, gatito y muñeca María.

Consigue la mayor cantidad de puntos de diversión de los invitados, jugando en el barro a preparar los pasteles de barro más adecuados. Lanza y selecciona dados, enlódate eligiendo la ubicación de tus pasteles, para finalizar registrando los pedidos de tus invitados; Al final del juego obtendrás puntos de diversión por la ubicación de tus pasteles y por tener los pasteles adecuados para cada pedido de los invitados.

¿Qué quiere ordenar?

boardgame.name: Defanged Despot
boardgame.description:
From the description:

People want the original six classes in the SCVMATORIUM? But they're not third-par... what if I were to take the classes from the core MB rulebook and disguise them as my own writings? Delightfully devilish.

The Defanged Despot is the fourth in a series of derivative classes for MÖRK BORG.

It was all going well until it wasn’t. You had everything, and then you had nothing. You were equal to the best, but now you’re just like the rest — destitute and utterly doomed. Although it’s somehow even worse than that, because you didn’t start at the bottom, unlike this other scum. Yet here you are. Wretched and irrevocably alone…

boardgame.name: Desperate Farmhand
boardgame.description:
From the description:

The yields: ever lower. The work: ever harder.
The pay? What? Get back to work before I thrash you!

The Desperate Farmhand is a class for MÖRK BORG, because all good adventures need an underpaid farmworker discovering a greater destiny. Even when the world is doomed.

boardgame.name: Spheretical Hermetic
boardgame.description:
From the description:

People want the original six classes in the SCVMATORIUM? But they're not third-par... what if I were to take the classes from the core MB rulebook and disguise them as my own writings? Delightfully devilish.

The Spheretical Hermetic is the third in a series of derivative classes for MÖRK BORG.

The forbidden books and scratchings of your study SCREAM the indisputable truth. Cube-Violet is a SPHERE: at night she hovers the sky, clear as day. But why would THEY lie about it? What could THEY possibly stand to gain? It doesn’t matter — curse these falsehoods of a doomed world and burn those shadowed ones who keep them! Basilisk or NOT!

boardgame.name: Le Dilemme de la Reine
The Queen's Dilemma
boardgame.description:
The Queen's Dilemma is a sequel to The King's Dilemma, the award-winning (and Kennerspiel des Jahres-nominated) interactive narrative legacy game, and uses the same Dilemma Card System to bring players into another adventure set in the Kingdom of Ankist.

Much of the gameplay of The Queen's Dilemma will be focused on a big map of the kingdom: players will take control of different regions, and manage them. There will be several resources to gather, with different uses, and players will be able to exchange them to construct buildings and other personal improvements.

The tense voting sessions and tough decisions that made The King's Dilemma such a huge success will still be there, right at the center of the experience, but their outcomes will involve more than resource tracks going up and down this time. Event cards will have more varied effects too, having an impact on specific regions.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Wo wars's?
boardgame.description:
16 large animal cards are laid out in a square, the small animal chips with the same images are also placed face up in the center, each tile must be exposed. Whoever's turn it is rolls the dice and moves the figure on the large cards accordingly, the animal on the card shows which small tile must be turned over. If the figure lands on an animal that is no longer visible, the player must try to find the matching small tile. If he succeeds, he gets a chip, whoever has 4 chips first wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Blumen-WO
boardgame.description:
A memory of 4 cards. The playing cards each contain 4 identical pictures. The cards are laid out face down and 4 cards are turned over by one player at a time. If two, three or four identical cards are revealed, you get to keep them.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Throwing Star
boardgame.description:
A two-card throwing game.

Players stand back to back, each with a throwing star in hand. They take three steps and at the count of three, they turn around and throw their star at their opponent.

The first player to land a hit wins. Wear eye protection. Hits to the head = Disqualification.

As someone who has some experience in throwing cards, the speed element of this can make things pretty wild. If you try to throw it too fast, it will NOT hit your target. If you wait too long, you will get hit.


This game was a stretch goal add-on for the Ninja: Silent But Deadly Kickstarter.

Delivered in the February 2016 Board Game of the Month Club $10+ package.

boardgame.name: The Colour Beyond Time
boardgame.description:
From the publisher blurb:

This is a Medieval Mythos Mystery adventure-setting for 3-5 players and a GM

"Your Baron, the honoured Philip De Guiarme, has set you on a mission.

As a result of being on the correct side of a recent revolt against the king, he has gained land and prestige. To this end he wishes to assay all the wealth and holdings of his newly acquired, but rather sparsely populated, barony.

The King himself has been considering such an endeavour for all the land due to the recent upheaval, and Philip, being the smart man his is, wishes to get ahead of the game in case he finds something of great value, which he may need to declare, or not.

You, and your worthy companions in arms, are being sent to the Southern Fenlands to carry out this task and to especially investigate a coastal village called Honningsby which seems to exist on a map, but no one has had word from them in many months”.

The adventure is systemless and assumes the use of a relevant roleplaying system dealing with mystery and eldritch horror.

boardgame.name: Taco Back Goat Cheese Pizza
Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza: On The Flip Side
boardgame.description:
Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza: On The Flipside

Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza is back with new characters and new rules!

As in Snap and Dobble, each player places a card from their hand face up into a community pile while saying taco/cat/goat/cheese/pizza in player sequence. When the card matches the mantra — boom! — everyone slaps their hand on the deck, with the last one to slap picking up the cards. Whoever rids themselves of cards first wins!

The entire deck is split between 2-8 players, who then place their individual stack of cards face-down in front of them. Each person takes a turn flipping a card face-up on a pile in the middle while saying the words “Taco,” “Cat,” “Goat,” “Cheese,” “Pizza” — in that order. If the card in the middle matches the word being spoken, the players race to slap their hands down on top of all the cards. Whoever is last must add the entire stack to their own set of cards. The winner is the person who gets rid of all their cards first.

For extra fun, special action cards force players to make certain gestures before racing to slap the deck!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Terra Firma
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





Play God in this world simulator.User Summary

boardgame.name: Path to Prosperity
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





My friend Phil and I (John) realised we couldn't find the game we wanted to play, and each one we tried didn't deliver. We decided it was time to learn the tools to make it ourselves.
We noticed RTS games were focusing on fast reaction speeds and ramping up the amount of clicks, but they were ignoring the bigger picture strategy. We wanted a game which promoted strategy based on observation and intrepretation. Assessing what your enemy is planning and working to counter that whilst developing your own tactics for victory.

The Goal:
To send the winning amount of coin to your Queen... before your opponent does.

Gather, craft or grow what you need to build your economy.
Build your village, produce and sell goods, hire soldiers and scouts - win against your opponents!

Think hard about every investment, be it a plantation, new technology or soldier - spend wisely or risk being out-played.

Explore the Jungle to find hidden treasures!
Ore veins to be exploited for a quick income (provided you can defend what you take!). Or, if lucky, you may come across a hidden chest to give you an edge!
Will you be able to find them before your enemy? They could boost your early income. Or, could you find a recipe or technology to unlock a late-game benefit?

But beware... The Jungle hides dangers too...
You never leave your village without your pistol, but is that going to be enough?
Is it worth the investment in soldiers to escourt you or clear the path? Don't forget to keep an eye on your opponent to ensure they are not sending soldiers your way.
Otherwise, you may find yourself dead.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Planet Miner
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





Control your over, mine minerals, upgrade your craft and reach the portal.User Summary

boardgame.name: Wrestling Revolution 2D
boardgame.description:
The original 2D wrestling sim that started a revolution now includes BOTH sides of the business in one epic universe! Create your own star and embark on a career inside the ring, or take responsibility for an entire promotion if you think you can do a better job. Either way, you'll have to make the right moves to come out on top in a massive universe of 350 characters that evolves before your eyes every week. Fully unlocked as standard, you can even save your changes to each roster to make the world your own. Or simply blow off steam in "Exhibition" matches of your own creation, where the unique animation system allows anything to happen at any moment!

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Boris Russian Bear
boardgame.description:
Play as a Russian bear defending his homeland.

User Summary

boardgame.name: Ping Pong Literario
boardgame.description:
A creative game to talk about books, literature and much more.
Ideal to play it at all times in homes, schools, libraries and desktops.

Three ways to play. The conversation is the protagonist and these cards know it. It is not a trivia game. We all have an answer for these letters.


Game modes

Ping Pong: A game to generate and share conversations about your reading journey.

InversaMente: Score points by guessing the other players' answers.

Tell me what you answer is... and I'll tell you what you read: To win you must discover the questions with the clues they give you.

The Winner is the one who reach the total points agreed upon at the start of the game or is winning after the session is over.

boardgame.name: Ping Pong Literario 2
boardgame.description:
A creative game to talk about books, literature and much more.
Ideal to play it at all times in homes, schools, libraries and desktops.

Three ways to play. The conversation is the protagonist and these cards know it. It is not a trivia game. We all have an answer for these letters.


Game modes

Ping Pong: A game to generate and share conversations about your reading journey.

InversaMente: Score points by guessing the other players' answers.

Tell me what you answer is... and I'll tell you what you read: To win you must discover the questions with the clues they give you.

True or false: The same question can have different answers, depending on whether the truth is told or not. Try to find out if the other players are lying and score a lot of points!

The Winner is the one who reach the total points agreed upon at the start of the game or is winning after the session is over.

boardgame.name: CompactO
boardgame.description:
Create squares on planes and earn money.

User Summary

boardgame.name: CryptoClickers: Crypto Idle Game
boardgame.description:
Cryptocurrencies are one the most trending technologies in the online world, so why not put it all in an idle game? That's CryptoClickers. Make numbers go up while being a part of the cryptocurrency history by playing CryptoClickers!

What to expect

CryptoClickers is a complex and grindy Idle/Clicker Game revolved around Cryptocurrencies that's full of unique game modes, upgrades, challenges, events, and a double layer prestige system!

There are lots of fun ways of getting tons of massive numbers, up to e10000s is guaranteed!

There are two major prestige layers, the first one being Hardfork in Ethereum and the second one being Grand Hardfork in Bitcoin.

There are 21 Challenges in Ethereum that reward you in Server Parts, and there are 10 Speedrun Challenges in Bitcoin!

There are two big upgrade trees in the game. The first one "Server," which is where you spend your server parts! This one is located in Ethereum. The second one "BIT Upgrades" is located in Bitcoin!

There are a lot of gamemodes and ways to make numbers grow! Some gamemodes and features are: Generators, Drones, Node, 51% Attack, Hacking, GPU, and more!

As a bonus, players are able to play events that change daily. There are 7 different events and they get reset every new week. These challenges can be done hourly!

Disclaimer: This is just a game, no real cryptocurrencies are involved in the game :)

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: LowPolis
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





LowPolis is a city-building game with strategy and management elements. Friendly pace and balanced learning curve let you take a break. Neat lowpoly graphics will make the game run smoothly even on modest computers.Well then, enter the realm! :)

Build Your Kingdom

The citizens are awaiting their wise ruler.

Are you the one who will lead them to prosperity?


Build the city starting from a pioneer town.
Secure basic needs with food and water.
Collect resources and manufacture goods.
Provide services to the population.
Manage taxes and happiness.
Advance to the next level and unlock more buildings.
Fight rampant fires and disease.
Prepare for battle.


Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Casino: The game of Gambling Strategy
boardgame.description:
Similar to Monopoly, players roll dice and move around the board, perform actions as listed on the squares they land on. Some squares require the players to roll dice, play cards, or use a roulette wheel to gain or lose gambling chips.

Lose all your chips and you're out of the game. The first player to collect a set or more of color-coded casinos and to 'cut and run' with their chips, wins.

boardgame.name: Microvania
boardgame.description:
Publisher's Blurb

Microvania is a game about stories where individuals or small groups explore a dangerous world that becomes a character of itself. In video games, there are called "Metroivani," after the tow most influential series in the genre. A common feature of those games is backtracking, with the A common world recontextualized after unlocking a new item or ability or ins some cases just learning something new about how how the world works. Microvania seeks to create an experience like those games by prioritizing the structure and flow of the world, while allowing plsyers to fill in as many details as they likc, and making backtracking central to the games mechanics.

boardgame.name: myFloppy Online!
boardgame.description:
Join the online pet revolution.

User Summary

boardgame.name: Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 – The Official Video Game
boardgame.description:
Take to the global stage and go for gold this Summer! The Olympic Games are back, and this time it's your chance for glory. Engage in a wide variety of accessible, arcade style sports as you compete to win the gold.

EPIC ARCADE SPORTS ACTION

The Official Game includes 18 fun fueled arcade style sporting events to play by yourself or with your friends and family. Go the distance with events such as the 100m, Boxing, Baseball, Table Tennis and more.

CRAFT YOUR DREAM ATHLETE

With a robust avatar creation system, you can easily create the athlete of your dreams. Want to run hurdles as a pirate or become the first astronaut boxing champion? It's up to you! Eager to grab that gold, share your Avatar Creation Code with friends or use theirs to help you create your ultimate dream team!

COMPETE WITH FAMILY & FRIENDS

Celebrate the greatest sporting event on Earth with your friends and family with couch co-op or take the Olympic experience online with 2-8 player Multiplayer. Want to test your skills against the world? Lace up your sneakers and compete with other players in Ranked mode.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: The Cluster Eye Tribe
The Cluster-Eye Tribe
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Deep in the Drakwald forest, beyond remote and wary forester’s villages, past the roving herds of Beastmen, and the trails of nameless creatures lies the Black Pit, secret and sacred lair of Night Goblins. Around them lies the territory of the Cluster-Eye Tribe, a confederation of Forest Goblin warbands who deal with the Black Pit for precious iron weaponry. Those few who know of this corner of the Drakwald avoid it at all costs, for Cluster-Eye warbands rove its perimeter to find captives, leading them off into the night to pay their debts to the Black Pit.

The Cluster-Eye Tribe of Forest Goblins haunt the Drakwald. While many Goblin tribes are subject to control by their larger Orcish cousins, the Cluster-Eye Tribe remains fiercely independent, thanks in no small part to warbands like that of Vish Venombarb.

This digital product provides stat profiles for Vish Venombarb, his Shaman Bograt the Blasted, one of the warband’s elite warriors, and one of their sneaky scouts, as well as the terrifying spiders they ride into battle. All are fully prepared and ready to be used against any band of adventurers foolish enough to cross their path. A selection of plot hooks, descriptions of the disposition of Vish’s forces and their typical tactics are also detailed, resulting in a Goblin encounter your Players are unlikely to forget — if they survive.

The Cluster-Eye Tribe is the first in a series of digital releases describing various tribes, warbands, and groups of roving troublemakers. Along with full profiles for various personalities from the warband, each release also provides templates for war-chiefs, shamans, elite warriors, and raw recruits that can be used to advance any of the basic creature templates found in the Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay Rulebook.

boardgame.name: Escape Room: The Game – Nuclear Countdown
boardgame.description:
The beeping of the fax machine catches you off guard. It's a bomb threat, it says a bomb will go off tonight somewhere downtown. The fax was easy to trace, you and your team head out and 23 minutes later you knock on the door of one William Teller. No answer. The lock on the door is as poor as the building you're standing in and within seconds you're in the apartment. You see a table that is filled with all kinds of materials that send shivers down your spine. At that moment, your phone rings and your worst nightmare becomes reality, the bomb threat is real! William Teller has been arrested and was making a big scene, saying he wanted a window seat to watch the explosion at 8:00pm sharp. You realize that's in exactly one hour ...

Expansion puzzle to any Escape Room: The Game base game that contains the Chrono Decoder. This expansion was originally included in the 2016 Escape Room: The Game.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Series: Escape Room – The Game (Identity Games International B.V.)

boardgame.name: Charms: Quests For Antiracism
boardgame.description:
Quests for Antiracism can expand CHARMS: A Game of Insight. Players ask questions, roll and interpret inspiring game pieces, and try to discover the most amazing insights toward antiracism. *Or the game's questions can be used for dialogue, reflection, or writing prompts on your own or with any size group. Includes options for online play!

—description from the publisher
